attachment.heading: TRIBALLY DESIGNATED HOUSING ENTITY ACT OF 2021

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "TRIBALLY DESIGNATED HOUSING ENTITY ACT OF 2021 ("Act")."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The Purpose of this Act is to designate the San Ildefonso Housing Authority as the Tribally Designated Housing Entity ("TDHE") for the Pueblo.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo has the authority to undertake the formation of a housing authority; and
The Council enacted a law to establish the San Ildefonso Housing Authority (SIHA); and

Under the authority of the Native American Housing Assistance and Self Determination Act of 1996 (NAHASDA), Indian tribes may designate existing Indian Housing Authorities as a TDHE to provide and administer approved Indian housing activities.

The Council hereby designates the San Ildefonso Housing Authority as the Tribally Designated Housing Entity for the Pueblo effective January 1, 2022 in accordance with the Native American Housing Assistance and Self Determination Act of 1996.
As the TDHE, the San Ildefonso Housing Authority is authorized to develop and administer Indian Housing Plans on behalf of the Pueblo.
